physical_appearance: This is a brass sprinkler flask. It has a tall, slender neck with a wide foot and body. The base, body and nozzle are decorated with concentric rings. The neck does not have any carved rings. There are some minor scratches on the sprinkler, especially on the neck. There are no inscriptions or decorative motifs seen.
subject_terms_1: brasswork (visual works) ceremonial objects customs (social concepts)
subject_terms_2: Brasswork Ceremonial objects Manners and customs
